text:
I'm trying to install on Windows 10 and am running into an error I can't figure out. It appears to be related to hiredis, which as far as I can tell should install on Windows. Has anyone run into this?

title: Installation on Windows

text:
Hi, @dland512 
I think you need msvc compiler to build hiredis
Okay, I'll look into that. Thank you.
